Iâ€™m also curious about `<https://forms.hscollectedforms.net>` - I have observed GET requests which appear to send information to this URL even after I have tried to place the Do Not Track cookie as documented here. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/events/cookie-banner#hs_cos_wrapper_widget_1634932632413_>

Would be great to get some docs from HubSpot on how to *not* track people.

Hi beautiful people! I've 2 questions:

Can i make Hubl sites for personal reasons?
How can I get the certification? I took the course a few years ago
